title: How to write a fictional story that takes place in a country where I barely have an understanding of their culture - Quora

response.answer_text: Research. Read books, magazines, blog posts from there. See movies made there. Eat food from there, if you can find a restaurant. Go there and visit for a while. If that's not possible, talk to people from there. The internet makes that doable. Study the language from there. Language and culture are completely intertwined. Even a few lessons could help. It all depends on how authentic you want to be.
